Package es.udc.redes.webserver

Class ServerThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
es.udc.redes.webserver.ServerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
A extends Thread class that receive petitions from a socket and send the response through the same socket. It is thought to be used by a browser. It implements the HTTP 1.1 protocol.
Author:
319

  • Method Details

    • estadoAndCabeceira

      private java.lang.String estadoAndCabeceira​(java.lang.String url)
      This method analyze the given file and build a string that contains the HTTP/1.1 state and head format.
      Parameters:
      url - A path to a file (existent or not).
      Returns:
      A string type with a HTTP/1.1 protocol format answer.

    • cabeceira

      private java.lang.String cabeceira​(java.lang.String url)
      This method analyze the given file and build a string that contains the HTTP/1.1 head format.
      Parameters:
      url - A path to a file (it has to exist).
      Returns:
      A string type with a HTTP/1.1 protocol format answer.

    • entidade

      private byte[] entidade​(java.lang.String url) throws java.io.IOException
      It opens a stream to a file, reads the content and write it in an output byte array stream. Then return the array of bytes.
      Parameters:
      url - A path to a file (it has to exist).
      Returns:
      A array of bytes that contains a image or text file content.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - It throws a exception if the file reader stream can't be open.

    • log

      private void log()
      After the method is running, it writes in an error file or in an access file information about the answer sent through the socket. The write file depends on the type of the sent state. It writes: Petition type IP address Date State code (if it's access) Size (if it's access) Error code (if it's error)

    • dinamicPage

      private java.lang.String dinamicPage​(java.lang.String url)
      Reads the parameters of a HTTP 1.1 dynamic request and execute the appropriate class.
      Parameters:
      url - A path with parameters and a name of a servlet class.
      Returns:
      A string type with a HTTP/1.1 protocol format answer.

    • allow

      private java.lang.String allow​(java.lang.String url)
      Build a html string type with the entries that the directory contains.
      Parameters:
      url - A path directory name.
      Returns:
      A string type with a HTTP/1.1 protocol format answer.

    • specialCabeceiraAndHead

      private java.lang.String specialCabeceiraAndHead​(java.lang.String name)
      This method build a string that contains the HTTP/1.1 state and head format. It not analyze any file. Only build the string with the 200 response.
      Parameters:
      name - A String with a answer information.
      Returns:
      A string type with a HTTP/1.1 protocol format answer.

    • run

      public void run()
      Opens the input and output streams, receive the request, split the petition, analyze it and send the response through the socket.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread
